requests.name: search dago with highlight
requests.data:
{
    "@odata.context": "https://SEARCHSERVICE.search.windows.net/$metadata#indexes/$entity",
    "name": "hotels",
    "fields": [
        {
            "name": "hotelId",
            "type": "Edm.String",
            "searchable": false,
            "filterable": true,
            "retrievable": true,
            "sortable": true,
            "facetable": true,
            "key": true,
            "analyzer": null
        },
        {
            "name": "baseRate",
            "type": "Edm.Double",
            "searchable": false,
            "filterable": true,
            "retrievable": true,
            "sortable": true,
            "facetable": true,
            "key": false,
            "analyzer": null
        },
        {
            "name": "hotelName",
            "type": "Edm.String",
            "searchable": true,
            "filterable": true,
            "retrievable": true,
            "sortable": true,
            "facetable": true,
            "key": false,
            "analyzer": null
        },
        {
            "name": "starRating",
            "type": "Edm.Int32",
            "searchable": false,
            "filterable": true,
            "retrievable": true,
            "sortable": true,
            "facetable": true,
            "key": false,
            "analyzer": null
        },
        {
            "name": "smartDeal",
            "type": "Edm.Boolean",
            "searchable": false,
            "filterable": true,
            "retrievable": true,
            "sortable": true,
            "facetable": true,
            "key": false,
            "analyzer": null
        },
        {
            "name": "freeWifi",
            "type": "Edm.Boolean",
            "searchable": false,
            "filterable": true,
            "retrievable": true,
            "sortable": true,
            "facetable": true,
            "key": false,
            "analyzer": null
        },
        {
            "name": "reviewScore",
            "type": "Edm.Double",
            "searchable": false,
            "filterable": true,
            "retrievable": true,
            "sortable": true,
            "facetable": true,
            "key": false,
            "analyzer": null
        },
        {
            "name": "reviewCount",
            "type": "Edm.Int32",
            "searchable": false,
            "filterable": true,
            "retrievable": true,
            "sortable": true,
            "facetable": true,
            "key": false,
            "analyzer": null
        },
        {
            "name": "areaName",
            "type": "Edm.String",
            "searchable": true,
            "filterable": true,
            "retrievable": true,
            "sortable": true,
            "facetable": true,
            "key": false,
            "analyzer": null
        },
        {
            "name": "address",
            "type": "Edm.String",
            "searchable": true,
            "filterable": true,
            "retrievable": true,
            "sortable": true,
            "facetable": true,
            "key": false,
            "analyzer": null
        },
        {
            "name": "coordinate",
            "type": "Edm.GeographyPoint",
            "searchable": false,
            "filterable": true,
            "retrievable": true,
            "sortable": true,
            "facetable": false,
            "key": false,
            "analyzer": null
        },
        {
            "name": "imageUrl",
            "type": "Edm.String",
            "searchable": false,
            "filterable": false,
            "retrievable": true,
            "sortable": false,
            "facetable": false,
            "key": false,
            "analyzer": null
        }
    ],
    "scoringProfiles": [
        {
            "name": "highlyReviewed",
          	"text": null,
            "functions": [
                {
                    "fieldName": "reviewScore",
                    "freshness": null,
                    "interpolation": "quadratic",
                    "magnitude": {
                        "boostingRangeStart": 8,
                        "boostingRangeEnd": 10,
                        "constantBoostBeyondRange": false
                    },
                    "distance": null,
                    "tag": null,
                    "type": "magnitude",
                    "boost": 100
                }
            ],
            "functionAggregation": "sum"
        }
    ],
    "defaultScoringProfile": null,
    "corsOptions": null,
    "suggesters": [
        {
            "name": "sg",
            "searchMode": "analyzingInfixMatching",
            "sourceFields": [
                "hotelName"
            ]
        }
    ]
}
